channel.title: 3 Errors :/
channel.description:
I followed a quest guide, and got 3 errors
[CODE]client.java:4032: illegal start of expression public void q12help() { ^ client.java:4032: illegal start of expression public void q12help() { ^ client.java:4032: ';' expected public void g12help() { 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/CODE]
Any help?

item.title: 3 Errors :/
item.dc:creator: @VestaPK VestaPK
item.description:
@VestaPK wrote:

Oh-Noes, quick spot

Read full topic

item.title: 3 Errors :/
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

Thatâ€™s exactly it.

sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
Appears twice at the end of q12help.
Take one of them and put it on the end of q11help.

Or just replace that with this:

} public void q11help() { sendQuest("The Wolf's Cure", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); if(q11 == 0){ sendQuest("I can start this quest by talking to Merlin.", 8147); sendQuest("He is located at Seer's Village near the bank.", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); } if(q11 == 1){ sendQuest("Merlin has asked me to find him the following ingredients:", 8147); sendQuest("1 Spider egg, 1 ash, and 1 bag of salt.", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); } if(q11 == 15){ sendQuest("I have completed the quest!", 8147); sendQuest("I can now buy Black and Dragon gloves from Giles.", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); } sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); } public void q12help() { sendQuest("Death Plateau", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); if(q12 == 0){ sendQuest("I can start this quest speaking to the Sergeant", 8147); sendQuest("of Burthorpe, he is located in his tent.", 8148); sendQuest("I can get to Burthorpe using the portal at", 8149); sendQuest("the Beginner training area.", 8150); } if(q12 == 1){ sendQuest("I have to go up the mountain to kill a troll", 8147); sendQuest("while wearing the climbing boots.", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); } if(q12 == 2) { sendQuest("I killed the troll and he dropped a key", 8147); sendQuest("that I must take back to the sergeant", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); } if(q12 == 3) { sendQuest("I must get Serg a chest which can be bought", 8147); sendQuest("from the shop for one million coins.", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); } if(q12 == 4) { sendQuest("I must bring 10 noted dragon bones to hans, which", 8147); sendQuest("I can buy for ten thousand coins each. ", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); } if(q12 == 5) { sendQuest("I must light the teleporting logs using the magic", 8147); sendQuest("Tinder box and kill whatever awaits on the other side.", 8148); sendQuest("Perhaps I should be ready for combat before teleporting.", 8149); sendQuest("The anger battle axe will prove useful.", 8150); } if(q12 == 6) { sendQuest("I have killed the mysterious monster, and I should", 8147); sendQuest("now report back to the Sargeant.", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); } if(q12 == 15) { sendQuest("Quest Completed!", 8147); sendQuest("1 x Dragon Armour Lump", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); sendQuest("", 8151); } sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); } public void sendFrame106(int i1){ outStream.createFrame(106); outStream.writeByteC(i1); }

Read full topic

item.title: 3 Errors :/
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

Thatâ€™s what I got, is there something up with that?

Iâ€™ll rep if you can help me fix.

item.title: 3 Errors :/
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

Make sure you didnâ€™t start adding the new void before

sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
For the previous void. In delta at least, I know that each q#help() void has that bit of code at the end of it - so just make sure you didnâ€™t skip it.
Thatâ€™s all I can think of right now, Iâ€™m probably wrong.

Read full topic
